downloadTitle: Online and On-Premises Solutions for Project Server 2013
downloadDescription: This white paper discusses what it takes to successfully implement Project Server 2013, whether it be in an on-premises solution or an online solution with Office 365.

downloadFile.name: Project Server 2013 Online and On-Premises Solutions.docx

detailsSection: This white paper by Rob Bowers (Microsoft Consulting Services) provides guidance and best practices for those who are involved in a Project Server 2013 implementation. What does it take to implement Project Online as opposed to an on-premises solution? Why would I want to go with one solution over the other? The target audience consists of partners, consultants, decision makers, and technical personnel who need to understand what it takes to successfully implement Project Server 2013 in their environment, whether it be an on-premises solution or an online solution with Office 365.
detailsSection_file_name: Project Server 2013 Online and On-Premises Solutions.docx
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
